Sentences:
Today Tobi, your apprenticeship ends. I will teach you the secret technique of our ninja school: 
 The lightning step !

First, you need to touch the circle on the left side of the screen to choose a direction. 
 Then touch the jump button on the right to propel yourself.
 the lightning step is so fast you won't stop until you hit a wall!
Remember, first the left to select a direction then the jump to mave forward.

If you are that confident try it on this guard. Jumping toward one of them will take care of him. 
 But be careful, if he sees you, you will have to restart.
Let us move on to the next test.
